import {Grid, Button} from 'semantic-ui-react' import React, {useState} from 'react' function AddANewGym() { const [formData, setFormData] = useState([]) function handleSubmit (e) { e.preventDefault(); fetch('/gyms/new', { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', }, body: JSON.stringify(formData) }) .then(res => res.json()) .then(onFormSubmit) // .then(setFormData(initialData)) history.push('/') } return(

Have your own gym? Add it the list!
) } export default AddANewGym
